title: Add clickable call number and configure WhatsApp booking link

requirements.text: Configure the site-wide WhatsApp booking/chat target number to 9226121208 (India), so all existing WhatsApp CTAs open WhatsApp to this number.

quotes: Add contact number for call and booking via whatsapp 9226121208. Create link directly goes bookings on my WhatsApp number

acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/config/whatsapp.ts` uses phone number `919226121208` (country code + number, no spaces) as the WhatsApp target.
Clicking the existing WhatsApp CTA button in the Hero section opens `https://wa.me/919226121208?...` in a new tab.
Clicking the existing WhatsApp CTA button in the Contact section opens `https://wa.me/919226121208?...` in a new tab.
No alert about WhatsApp not being configured is shown in normal usage.

requirements.text: Add a clickable phone contact for calls using the contact number 9226121208, including a `tel:` link that works on mobile and desktop.

quotes: Add contact number for call and booking via whatsapp 9226121208.

acceptanceCriteria: The Contact section displays the phone number `9226121208` in the UI.
The phone number is a clickable link using `href="tel:+919226121208"` (or equivalent) and triggers the device dialer when clicked on supported devices.
User-facing text for the phone/contact area is in English.

constraints: Do not modify immutable hook files listed in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Adding an online appointment form or storing bookings in the backend.
Adding new authentication or backend functionality.
